name: Water Shuriken
description: You fire a barrage of sharp shurikens at a target. Make a ranged attack roll, doing 1d4 + MOVE water damage on a hit. After successfully hitting a target, roll a d4. On a result of 3 or 4, another shuriken strikes the target for an additional 1d4 water damage. Continue this process until you fail to roll a 3 or 4 on the d4 roll, up to a maximum of four additional hits.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
